entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 6.57

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Soft Interface Disc Pad 70166, 5 in x 1/2 in, 10 per case

  • 3M™ Soft Interface Disc Pad is constructed of ½ in (12.7 mm) soft-density foam with a clean sanding hole pattern to allow dust extraction and minimize loading during sanding
  • The soft foam construction enables the pad to conform to edges and contours, making it a good match for sensitive workpieces where gouging and marring is a top concern.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • 3M™ Soft Interface Disc Pad provides extra cushion for coated and non-woven abrasive discs to prevent gouging and marring
  • Soft-density foam responds to contours and edges
  • Designed with clean sanding hole pattern to help with dust extraction and minimize loading
  • 3M™ Hookit™ Attachment Systems help expedite swapping out of discs during multi-step sequences

3M Stikit Roloc Disc Pad 02727, 1-1/4 in x 5/16 in, 10 per inner 20 per case

  • Vinyl face material provides secure disc adhesion yet allows quick, easy removal with no residue

entry.summary:

Price: 52.60

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Disc Pad Holder 947, 7 in x 1 in x 5/8 in 5/8-11 Internal, 1 per case

  • 3M™ Hookit™ Disc Pad securely holds a 3M™ Hookit™ Sanding Discs or 3M™ Hookit™ Finishing Disc or 3M™ Finesse-it™ Buffing Pad for use with a hand-held sanding tool such as a rotary, orbital, or random orbital sander
  • The 45-degree tapered edge provides flexibility and allows the sanded area to be easily blended and feather-edged.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • J hooks securely hold a 3M Hookit disc or 3M Finesse-it buffing pad
  • For use with a random orbital sander, rotary sander, or right angle grinder
  • 3M Hookit system provides easy removal and re-use
  • 45 degree tapered edge provides some flexibility for feather-edging and blending
  • 15-degree tapered edge is ideal for final finishing on flat or contoured surfaces

entry.summary:

[shortdesc]

3M Stikit Low Profile Disc Pad, 20354, 6 in x 3/8 in x 5/16-24, external

  • 3M™ Stikit™ Low Profile Disc Pads are the most aggressive compared to 3M™ Standard Profile Disc Pads and 3M™ Low Profile Finishing Disc Pads
  • The low profile design provides better leveling and faster removal rates when flat sanding, allowing you to maximize your sanding productivity
  • This product is shock-resistant and features a blue vinyl face for optimal adhesion and removal of disc pad
  • Low profile disc pads are recommended for use with 3M™ Random Orbital Sanders for flat sanding applications.

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Low profile, firm-density foam is well-suited for flat sanding applications
  • Tapered edge provides some flexibility for feather-edging
